story: You push open the creaky door to reveal a cluttered workshop filled with discarded machinery and half-finished projects. A peculiar drone prototype lies on a workbench, surrounded by scattered tools and wires.

actions.action: Attempt to reassemble the drone prototype
actions.good: Your expertise in robotics allows you to quickly assemble the device, granting access to a hidden compartment containing valuable items.
actions.bad: Your attempt at reassembly triggers an unstable power surge, causing the drone's components to malfunction and deal damage to you.

actions.action: Search for tools to aid in disassembling the prototype
actions.good: You find a set of specialized tools that help you safely disassemble the drone, revealing a hidden compartment containing valuable items.
actions.bad: Your search for tools distracts you from potential dangers, causing you to overlook an active trap that deals damage.

actions.action: Investigate the scattered wires and components on the workbench
actions.good: You discover a crucial connection between the drone's systems, granting access to a hidden compartment containing valuable items.
actions.bad: Your investigation causes a short circuit, dealing damage to you as sparks fly from the electrical components.
